text: Yo! i need some phat farm samples from the storehouse, drop them at my desk please
name: MIKE

text: URGENT! WE GOT A SUPER IMPORTANT MEETING AT THE OFFICE, DROP WHAT YOU'RE DOING RN AND MOP THE FLOOR BEFORE THEY GET HERE!!!!!
name: BOB

text: Hey, i saw your sketches recently, really impressed by your work, maybe we could use some of your input, come to my desk
name: WLLIAM

text: Yo... i'm so hungover, please drop a soda at my desk
name: Russel's assistant

text: LORDNES: yo, let's rip a blunt, waiting for you near the bodega
UNKNOWN: bro, u sure u wanna do that wack shit, carrying boxes ad alldat? there is a spot on top of the office for graffiti, let em know who they working wid
ALSO i'd love to eat some ramen rn... Get some from the Bodega and drop it at my desk and MAYBE I'll schedule a meeting with Russel and you earlier...
name: Russel's assistant
